title: Development Course for Social Studies Design Tools Using Hierarchical Learning Activities

context.prior_knowledge: Basic social studies learning theories and experience with digital tools
context.additional_context: Designing asynchronous learning activities using learners' personal devices (BYOD), focusing on summative assessment outcomes

learning_goals: Learners can construct digital learning modules for social studies according to hierarchical design principles
Learners can visually design learning activity flows using tools based on IMS-LD Level A/B standards
Learners can design by separating conceptual models (activities/resources) from execution models (activity sequences)
Learners can propose learning design verification methods considering summative assessments
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
